tool.name: Fusion Annotation Tool
tool.description: Create annotated fusion output, based off of STAR-Fusion output.

param.name: json_sample_metrics
param.label: Sample metrics output in JSON format.

param.name: ensembl_mapping
param.label: ENST and RefSeq Mapping
param.help: TSV mapping of ENST to RefSeq transcript IDs.

param.name: gencode
param.label: GENCODE GTF
param.help: GENCODE GTF, as used by CTAT resource package.

param.name: filter
param.label: Filter non-coding RNAs
param.help: Check to remove specific non coding RNAs and tRNA mitochondrial genes. Keeps all others such as protein-coding mitochondrial genes. Based on this regular expression: MT-T|MT-RNR|RNA18S5|RNA28S5|RNA5-85S

param.name: genomeSource
param.label: Will you select a reference genome from your history or use a built-in index?
param.help: Built-ins were indexed using default options

param.name: index
param.label: Select a reference genome
param.help: If your genome of interest is not listed, contact the Galaxy team

validator.message: No indexes are available for the selected input dataset

tool.help:
usage: fusion_annotation.py [-h] [--starfusion STARFUSION] [--json_sample_metrics JSON_SAMPLE_METRICS] [--ensembl_mapping ENSEMBL_MAPPING] [--path_to_fasta PATH_TO_FASTA] [--gencode_gtf GENCODE_GTF] [--filt] [--output OUTPUT] [--version]
Annotate starfusion output with oncotator and nts sequences.
optional arguments: -h, --help show this help message and exit --starfusion STARFUSION STAR-Fusion output star- fusion.fusion_candidates.final.abridged.FFPM --json_sample_metrics JSON_SAMPLE_METRICS Sample level metrics file --ensembl_mapping ENSEMBL_MAPPING TSV mapping of ENST to RefSeq transcript IDs. --path_to_fasta PATH_TO_FASTA Full path to fasta.fa file, with index file --gencode_gtf GENCODE_GTF GENCODE GTF, as used in CTAT resource package. --filt filter out specific ribosomal and mitochondrial fusions --output OUTPUT output file --version show program's version number and exit
